title: Why im lvl 5?
body: It says im _**lvl 5**_, even though im _**lvl 30**_. Whats up with that? I wanna post a discussion and it says i need_** lvl 15**_ for it.

replies.body: It looks like before you posted this, your Boards profile was out of sync with the database that updates your summoner level. Usually attempting to post will force a resync and resolve the issue, which seems to be the case here. You now show as level 30 and should see no issues posting in the future.
Yes, it says im lvl 30 now. Thanks for the reply :P
